mapper.html:
A new issue has been reported.

Event: {{1.`3`}}
What is the issue: {{1.`1`}}
Email of reporting person (may be blank): {{1.`2`}}

The event will have been deleted automatically from the calendar and the Tweet will also have been removed. An admin will now need to check the event.Â Please log into the Google Account and find the 'Issue Reports' spreadsheet to complete the admin record. If the event turns out to be ok, you can manually re-add to the calendar and manually tweet again using the below information.

All the very best,
Your friendly automated email bot

Details: Timestamp: {{8.`0`}} Event title: {{8.`1`}} Location: {{8.`2`}} Start Date: {{8.`3`}} Start Time: {{8.`4`}} End Date: {{8.`5`}} End Time: {{8.`6`}} URL: {{8.`7`}} Description: {{8.`8`}}
